alert.note: Alert for New Madrid (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 25 at 2:52AM CST until January 25 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of western Kentucky and southeast Missouri to the south of a line from New Madrid Missouri to Calhoun Kentucky. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
